p: Readiness for Interprofessional Learning Scale (RIPLS) is a self-reported assessment of readiness of interprofessional learning [ 25]. We will use the Danish version of RIPLS with four subscales and 29 items distributed on a 5-point Likert scale, 5 = strongly agree, 4 = agree, 3 = neutral, 2 = disagree, 1 = strongly disagree). Items 10, 11 and 12 should be reversely coded [ 26]. The difference will be measured on the overall scale.
